definition: lit. set up a pole and see the shadow (idiom); fig. instant effect/quick results
to be at the highest level of enlightenment (Buddhist expression)
Peikan Island, one of the Matsu Islands/Peikan township in Lienchiang county 連江縣|连江县[Lian2 jiang1 xian4], Taiwan
Peikan township in Lienchiang county 連江縣|连江县[Lian2 jiang1 xian4] i.e. the Matsu Islands, Taiwan
Nankan Island, one of the Matsu Islands/Nankan or Nangan township in Lienchiang county 連江縣|连江县[Lian2 jiang1 xian4], Taiwan
Nankan or Nangan township in Lienchiang county 連江縣|连江县[Lian2 jiang1 xian4] i.e. the Matsu Islands, Taiwan
pole-vaulting/also written 撐桿跳|撑杆跳
pole vault/also written 撐桿跳高|撑杆跳高
benchmark/pole serving as mark or symbol/pole with a trophy hung on it
pole-climbing (as gymnastics or circus act)/climbing pole

sentences.english: By load, I mean the point along the shaft at which the rod flexes.
sentences.chinese: 我的意思是沿着竿身的彎曲點。

sentences.english: A composite rod is built with both graphite and fiberglass materials.
sentences.chinese: 複合竿是由碳纖維和玻璃缸材料一起製造的。

sentences.english: The staff is for my sheep, but the club is for predators.
sentences.chinese: 杖是牧羊杖，竿是用來對付捕食羊的野獸的。

sentences.english: He turned about to the west side, and measured five hundred reeds with the measuring reed.
sentences.chinese: 他又量了北面，按著測量竿計算，共長二百五十公尺。

sentences.english: It will give you all the advantages of one of our best all around bass rods in a spinning configuration.
sentences.chinese: 它可以給你一種最全能最頂級的紡車竿的享受。

sentences.english: But it also makes a very nice light saltwater rod for snook, redfish and specs.
sentences.chinese: 它也是一款非常優秀的輕型海水竿，適合釣紅魚等。

sentences.english: At front left, one man held up a long pole fledged at the tip with chicken feathers to catch any sign of the wind.
sentences.chinese: 前左立一人，手執長竿，竿尖上用雞羽爲葆。

sentences.english: At front left, one man held up a long pole fledged at the tip with chicken feathers to catch any sign of the wind.
sentences.chinese: 前左立一人，手執長竿，竿尖上用雞羽爲葆。

sentences.english: As soon as Li Qi took the pole and lowered the line she had a catch. Xing Youyan was the last one.
sentences.chinese: 李紋把竿遞給李綺，竿剛垂下，就釣上了一條小魚。

sentences.english: This rod has an action like a true ultra-light with a magnum powered butt-section.
sentences.chinese: 這是一款帶有加長握把的超軟調紡車竿。

sentences.english: Casting rods are the meat and potatoes of the bass fishing world.
sentences.chinese: 槍柄竿對釣鱸來說，是最基本的。

sentences.english: There was a bar hanging from the top of the tower, and I seized it for balance.
sentences.chinese: 高塔上垂下一根竿，我抓住它以求平衡。

sentences.english: The rod and staff were basic tools a shepherd used to protect and guide the sheep.
sentences.chinese: 杖和竿就像牧羊者保護羊羣指引羊羣的工具一樣。

sentences.english: God always sends His staff with His rod.
sentences.chinese: 神總是用祂的竿和杖指引我們。

sentences.english: Our flag is raised to the top of a pole by a rope and two pulley.
sentences.chinese: 我們的旗幟被用一根繩子和兩個滑輪升到了竿頂。
